channel.title: Github Pages on Evan's Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Github Pages on Evan's Tech Blog

item.title: Deploying a Hugo Site to GitHub Pages
item.description: Instructions Detailed instructions from Hugo website Host on GitHub Pages Additional Step (Required) Be sure to add a file entitled .gitmodules to the root of the hugo directory, with content similar to below: [submodule "themes/PaperMod"] path = themes/PaperMod url = https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod.git Edit the content appropriately to reference the name of the theme & the the github url for the link to the code of the theme.
